channel.title: Services on Welkin Works
channel.description: Recent content in Services on Welkin Works

item.title: Software Development
item.description: Consulting and development of modern cloud-based applications. We specialize in cloud-based containerized applications running in cloud platforms such as Kubernetes, and RedHat OpenShift. Some of our work include: Design and implementation of database systems, for both OLTP and OLAP purposes. Design and implementation of distributed systems based on microservices. API Gateways / load-balancers. For more information, and a free consultation, please feel free to contact us.

item.title: DevOps
item.description: A lightweight yet powerful stack for early startups. Having a good DevOps stack is one of the most important aspects of early startups. Let us handle your code-to-production pipeline, and you can focus on what's important, your product. Our custom DevOps stack includes: Gogs Every pipeline starts with your code. Gogs is a self-hosted alternative to enterprise GitHub and Bitbucket solutions. Drone The heart of our DevOps stack, it takes care of testing and converting your code into artifacts that can be used into following stages of the pipeline.
